alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 7:18PM EDT until April 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN QUEEN ANNE`S...NORTHEASTERN CAROLINE AND EAST CENTRAL KENT COUNTIES... At 718 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hope, or 8 miles northeast of Centerville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Goldsboro, Jumptown, Starkey Corner, Carville, Hope, Massey, Henderson, Marydel, Templeville and Barclay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
